Description.Details: High Explosive LMG Ammo contains shells that detonate on impact, generally splashing against armor, but dealing impressive damage when it finds a hole in the enemy's defences. Upon receiving a Critical Hit, any remaining ammunition stored inside an Ammo Bin will explode dealing damage to the install location. Risk can be mitigated with the use of C.A.S.E. Left Click on Ammo count during battle to swap Ammo Type. Ctrl+click on ammunition counter to eject ammo.
Description.Name: LMG Ammo [HE]
